title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, nothing moves.
EB: The lines should be indented to the left by one tab or four spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a default text editor. 2. Type in the following:
- Line 1: Start with a space
- Line 2: Start with a tab
- Line 3: Enter some text
- Line 4: Start with a tab
- Line 5: Enter some more text
3. Highlight lines 1 and 2. 4. Execute ShiftLeft. 5. Verify that lines 1 and 2 are indented to the left by one tab or four spaces.
